Property is being managed by Carpenter Management Company & the app. fee is 50/person (see instructions attached to the listing or at the property). Property available for 12 to 36 month lease and shows pride of ownership! Pets accepted on a case by case basis with a 300 deposit.

(202) 251-4296 - BEAUTIFUL BASEMENT APARTMENT FOR RENT (Waldorf Area) Rent: $1,095 Security Deposit: $1,095 1st month's rent and security deposit due at lease signing! 6-month lease available *Application Fee: $30 per adult Apartment Amenities: All utilities included Cable-ready Private key-entrance Full bath Bedroom Living Room Kitchenette (refrigerator, electric stove & microwave) Plush Carpeting throughout Ceramic Tile in Bathroom and Kitchenette Recess lighting throughout basement Street Parking Cats allowed only Convenient to Major Shopping Centers: St. Charles Town Center BJ Wharehouse Carmax Safeway Marshalls Target Movie Theatre Many restaurants And Much More! Preferences: Non-smoker *Application fee includes credit, public records and criminal background checks
No Dogs Allowed
(RLNE3522949) Other Amenities - Unfurnished, Parking, Smoke Free, Basement. Appliances - Air Conditioning, Refrigerator- Full size, Range- Electric, Oven- Electric, Microwave. Lease lengths - 6 Months, 9 Months, 12 Months. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Heat Included, Electricity Included, Gas Included, Water Included, Trash Pick-up Included. Pet policies - Cats Allowed, No Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(202) 768-8700 x802 - **RENT TO OWN this beautiful 2-story, 2,400 sf Colonial that's an entertainer's delight, featuring an in-ground swimming pool, hot tub, and outdoor tiki bar on a wooded 1-acre lot. Other features include skylights, upgraded woodwork and more! There are 4 BR. 2.5 BA and over-sized living areas. The FR comes with gleaming hardwood floors and wood stove, great kitchen with upgraded countertops, breakfast bar and plenty of cabinet space. The array of solar panels on the roof will save you hundreds of dollars each month, especially during the Summer! Enjoy the best of country living only a short drive to all the shops and restaurants in and around the St. Charles Towne Center, only minutes from your front door.
(RLNE3520165) Other Amenities - Pool- in-ground, Garage, Yard, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Microwave. Lease lengths - Rent-to-Own- 1-3 year term available. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Resident Pays Heat, Resident Pays Electricity, Resident Pays Gas, Resident Pays Water, High-Speed Internet Available, Resident Pays Trash Pick-up.

Description:
(301) 934-3268 - Kingsview Beauty – 3BR/2.5BA/Garage Parking - Located in the Kingsview community, this lovely 3-level townhome features garage parking, family room with fireplace, living/dining/kitchen level perfect for entertaining, MBR with en suite bath. Kingsview offers its residents ample walking/riding trails, pool and tennis courts, soccer field; private rear yard; washer/dryer. Minutes to all major shopping, entertainment and commuting routes. Pets allowed with management approval (non-refundable fee applies).
(RLNE3414093) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- community tennis courts, walking trails, sprinkler system, Pool, Garage. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.
